titleStmt.title: By the Major. A proclamation for the bringing into the Port of London, any manner of fevvell.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Wollaston, John, Sir.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Dated at end: Dated at the Guildhall, London, this 27 day of June, 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
